abstract: Schlumberger said Wednesday that it bought a French oil services company for $1.07 billion, The Associated Press reported.

lead_paragraph: Schlumberger said Wednesday that it bought a French oil services company for $1.07 billion, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Schlumberger Taps $1 Billion Deal for Geoservices
